2048

Brief: 2048 is a brain-teasing puzzle game that challenges players to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them and create a tile with the number 2048. The game tests your strategic and cognitive skills as you plan moves ahead to keep the board from filling up while aiming for that elusive 2048 tile.
